title: Mankind Pharma forays into agri-tech space, plans to invest Rs 200 crore - Business Standard
content: Mankind Pharma forays into agri-tech space, plans to invest Rs 200 crore  Business Standard
description: Mankind Pharma on Monday announced its foray into the agri-tech segment, with plans to invest up to Rs 200 crore in the first two to three years
